title: Surfboard Design and Production Technology Education: Supervisor-Guided and Video-Enhanced Learning-Based Project

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: The learner is an intermediate professional in administrative/management roles, aiming to enhance technical problem-solving skills in a blended learning environment utilizing personal devices (BYOD). Evaluation is based on the functional quality of the final surfboard prototype and the team collaboration process.

learning_goals: Learners can optimize the shape and material performance of a surfboard by applying fluid dynamics principles.
Learners can create blueprints using 3D modeling software and produce mock-ups via CNC machining processes.
Learners can improve design errors by over 80% by referencing supervisor feedback and instructional videos.

resources: Learning Management System (LMS) and Video Conferencing Tools

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
